import React,{Component}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BASE_URL="https://my-json-server.typicode.com/themeland/netstorm-json-2/blog";class Blog extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={data:[]};}componentDidMount(){axios.get(`${BASE_URL}`).then(res=>{this.setState({data:res.data.blogData});// console.log(this.state.data)
}).catch(err=>console.log(err));}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"blog-area",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row items",children:this.state.data.map((item,idx)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-md-4 item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card blog-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-thumb",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/blog-single",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.img,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"meta-info d-flex justify-content-between list-unstyled mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["By ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:item.author})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:item.date})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/blog-single",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn content-btn",href:"/blog-single",children:item.btnText})]})]})},`bd_${idx}`);})})})});}}export default Blog;
